attributes.action: Cancel Olympics and divert money to help flood victims and build better flood defences for future
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Do we need to spend money, some 9 billion and rising on Olympics when Britain is virtually flooded, no amount of rhetoric by Brown and Benn will help the victims of the flood nor will it do anything to ensuring that it won't happen again. A paltry 14 million was given to help the North of which only 1 million actually was made available to alleviate the suffering of people who have lost everything.

Yet we will pour billions into Olympics to satisfy the ego's of a few. With Jowell as Minister in charge we've no chance of controlling costs. 

We will lose face yes, but who cares, give it to Paris or Barcelona

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
